summary:
(Eng, Rus, Fra, Ita, Spa, Ger, Cze, Pol)
This mod allows you to equip up to 153 rings at once.
descriptionHtml:
Unlimited Rings Multilingual (Eng, Rus, Fra, Ita, Spa, Ger, Cze, Pol)


This mod allows you to equip up to 153 rings at once. Mod is multilingual, and supports English, Russian, French, Italian, Spanish, German, Czech and Polish versions of Skyrim.

Notice: you can\'t wear more than one ring of the same type, if it was enchanted by you.

If you want to add your language, please PM me.

Author: Solitarius
Language adaptation: TERAB1T (ElderScrolls.Net)

This mod on Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12493]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12493[/url]
author: Solitarius
